name: ALTAVA Group
intro: Metaverse company digitizing high-fidelity fashion branded assets
introduce: ALTAVA Group is a metaverse company digitizing high-fidelity fashion branded assets and building customized virtual experiences within ALTAVA Worlds, its own gamified social commerce platform; and ALTAVA Market, selling a range of NFTs of luxury fashion and lifestyle brands.ALTAVA Group aims to democratize luxury fashion and retail in the metaverse.
